fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterInternalControlI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HeaterTemperatureI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HeaterInternalControlCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Heater, HeaterInternalControlConnector, HeaterInternalControlInboundPort, HeaterInternalControlOutboundPort

    public interface HeaterInternalControlI
extends HeaterTemperatureI
    The interface HeaterInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the heater to its thermostat controller.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant
